name: Orange Moon
description: Search for new life forms as you try to survive on a mysterious hostile world in the surreal 2D action-platformer Orange Moon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Processor Q8200 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible card Additional Notes: Minimum screen resolution - 1366x768
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Core™2 Quad Processor Q8200 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible card
